componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
⚠️ Cannot Submit for Client Approval

To submit this task for client approval, you must first assign a Client User in the User Details section below.

Why? The Client User is the person who will receive and review the approval request. Once assigned, you can use the "Submit for Client Approval" quick action to begin the approval workflow.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
✅ Ready to Submit for Client Approval

This task is ready to submit for client approval. Use the "Submit for Client Approval" quick action above to begin the approval workflow.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
⏳ Waiting for Client Approval

This task has been submitted for client approval. The client will receive an email notification to review this task. Once approved, the status will automatically change to Pending and a developer can be assigned.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
👤 Assign a Developer

This task has been approved for development. Assign a Developer in the User Details section above to begin work on this task.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
💻 Ready for PM Review

When development is complete, use the "Submit for PM Review" quick action above to begin the review process. This will change the status to In Review and trigger the PM/Code Reviewer approval workflow.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
⏳ Waiting for PM/Code Reviewer Approval

This task is awaiting PM/Code Reviewer approval. Once approved, the task will automatically proceed to client completion approval. The PM/Code Reviewer will receive an email notification to review this task.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
✅ PM Approved - Waiting for Client Completion Approval

PM/Code Reviewer has approved this task. The client will receive an email notification to approve completion. Once approved, the status will automatically change to Completed.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
⚠️ Task Blocked by Dependencies

This task is at risk due to blocking dependencies. Check the Dependencies tab to see which tasks must be completed first. The task cannot proceed until all blocking dependencies are resolved.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
🚫 This Task is Blocking Other Tasks

This task is currently blocking other tasks from proceeding. Complete this task to unblock dependent tasks. Check the Dependencies component below to see which tasks are waiting on this one.
